USE goldcontainerDB
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROC create_views_from_tables 
                            @view_name NVARCHAR(100)
AS 
BEGIN 
DECLARE @statement VARCHAR(MAX)

   SET @statement = N'CREATE OR ALTER VIEW '+ @view_name +' AS
   SELECT * FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''https://store0sales0data.dfs.core.windows.net/gold/SalesLT/' + @view_name + '/'',
        FORMAT = ''DELTA''
       ) as [result]'
   EXEC (@statement)

END
GO

EXEC create_views_from_tables 'Product'
